Address.label: Address
Address.value: 23-1 WANGHAI ROAD,ROOM 102, XIAMEN SOFTWARE PARK PHASE 2 JIMEI DISTRICT, XIAMEN, 361008, China

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Pop Culture Group Co Ltd hosts entertainment events, operates hip-hop-related online programs, and provides event planning and execution services and marketing services to corporate clients. It generates revenue from our Event Hosting business by providing sponsorship packages to advertisers in exchange for sponsorship fees and by selling tickets for those concerts.
